name: Raiders of Treasure Island
description:
Action Sports, Multiplayer Combat
Intense multiplayer battles where you can go solo or team up, but there's only one ultimate goal - to get out alive!

Choose Your Profession Freely
Professions with distinct styles to suit your different combat preferences. A variety of weapons for free combination, fighting to the last moment.

Diverse Map Styles, Rich Rewards
Creepy towns, mysterious tombs... Various maps, different styles, all equally dangerous!

Enjoy the Fun of Treasure Hunting
Kill monsters to uncover treasures, or plunder from other players. As long as you make it out alive, the spoils are yours!

Science, Mystery, Treasure, Monsters, Companions, Plunder...
In the dangerous underworld, who will be the ultimate ruler?
The vast treasure lying dormant, whose hands will it fall into?
